title: 5 Ways To Speed Up Lightroom Classic (and some of my favorite shots from my Tokyo workshop)
description: Erik Kuna and I am back from an amazing week in Tokyo with 13 wonderful photographers. Man, we had an incredible experience – tons of photo opportunities, great food, great people (love the Japanese people), and a really great culture, lots of laughs and fun, and we even took a photo or two, all in an absolutely incredible place. If you’ve got a minute, here’s a link to some of my favorite images from the week, the story of it all, and some behind-the-scenes photos. Here’s the link. Next, here’s an absolutely fantastic new video from Terry White on 5 ways to speed up Lightroom Classic, and this is so helpful – SO helpful. If you’ve got a sec, check it out (it could save your hours. Heck, days!). Kick butt video, right? Thanks, Terry. 🙂 The Big Photography Show Coming To New York This Summer – It’s B&H Photo’s BILD Expo And I’m thrilled to be one of their speakers again this year. The BILD Expo, produced by the folks at B&H Photo, is an incredible event, with a stellar collection of instructors, tons of industry vendors and camera manufacturers, and a bunch of training tracks. This will be awesome (the last one was amazing), and I hope I’ll get to meet you there in person. It’s coming up June 17-18, 2025 at the Javits Center in New York. For more info and tickets, hit this link. WHO: Me and a stellar roster of instructors and vendors WHAT: The BILD ExpoWHERE: Javitz Center, New York City, NYWHEN: June 17-18, 2025TICKETS: Free, and you can get ’em right here. Lots of cool stuff happening. It’s going to “The summer of George.” Well, something like that. Have a great weekend, everybody! -Scott The post 5 Ways To Speed Up Lightroom Classic (and some of my favorite shots from my Tokyo workshop) appeared first on Lightroom Killer Tips.

html:
Erik Kuna and I am back from an amazing week in Tokyo with 13 wonderful photographers. Man, we had an incredible experience – tons of photo opportunities, great food, great people (love the Japanese people), and a really great culture, lots of laughs and fun, and we even took a photo or two, all in an absolutely incredible place. If you’ve got a minute, here’s a link to some of my favorite images from the week, the story of it all, and some behind-the-scenes photos.

Here’s the link.

Next, here’s an absolutely fantastic new video from Terry White on 5 ways to speed up Lightroom Classic, and this is so helpful – SO helpful. If you’ve got a sec, check it out (it could save your hours. Heck, days!).

Kick butt video, right? Thanks, Terry. 🙂

The Big Photography Show Coming To New York This Summer – It’s B&H Photo’s BILD Expo

And I’m thrilled to be one of their speakers again this year. The BILD Expo, produced by the folks at B&H Photo, is an incredible event, with a stellar collection of instructors, tons of industry vendors and camera manufacturers, and a bunch of training tracks. This will be awesome (the last one was amazing), and I hope I’ll get to meet you there in person. It’s coming up June 17-18, 2025 at the Javits Center in New York. For more info and tickets, hit this link.

WHO: Me and a stellar roster of instructors and vendors 
WHAT: The BILD Expo
WHERE: Javitz Center, New York City, NY
WHEN: June 17-18, 2025
TICKETS: Free, and you can get ’em right here.

Lots of cool stuff happening. It’s going to “The summer of George.” Well, something like that.

Have a great weekend, everybody!

-Scott
